caption: Was amazing! Great service, fantastic food. Will go back for sure anytime! Looking forward to it!! Great owner and great staff!!
This restaurant is amazing. Great service, the waiter was so helpful with understanding the menu. Food was above and beyond amazing. Loved everything. Will definitely be back!!!

The food is phenomenal, the environment was immaculately clean, the server was extremely knowledgeable of the menu. Some of the best service I've had anywhere. If you want delicious food, great service, and a relaxed environment, this is the place you want to be. Thank you so much for a great meal and a great experience!

I'm a huge fan of Indian. I ordered the Jalfrenzi. We are lucky to have some decent Indian cuisine in this area. I was very pleased with my meal .It reminded me of my favorite plate Raj Mahal on @ 6th St NYC. I will be returning :-)
Amazing food, very friendly and fast service, a gem in Fort Myers/Cape Coral Area!
Food is really good here,reminds of food in India, gobi munchurian was yummy, I would like to recommend this place to my friends also.
Everything was delicious! Best Nan I have ever had. Freshly made. Service and atmosphere was great.Will definitely be returning!
Delicious food, good prices, amazing service, pleasant and soothing atmosphere. If I lived here, I would definitely be a regular!
Amazing food! This was our first time to have curry and it was AMAZING!! Definitely would be a regular if I was a local and not a tourist!

We decided to eat here based on the reviews that have been published recently.  We have been to India and delight in sampling food from all over the world.  We are very well traveled and I would like to say this is an absolutely fantastic restaurant.  It is clean, smells great and the service is outstanding.  Our server Hannah never ran out of answers regarding the food and on rare occasions when she did not know something she volunteered to find out immediately.  Hannah is half Brazilian but you would think that she is pure Indian from her fund of knowledge about this food.  We highly recommend this place to anyone who wishes to try authentic, good quality, well-prepared Indian food.  We hope they continue in business for a long time into the future.  God bless them.

I have been ordering online from this restaurant for months and have enjoyed the food. Today i ordered the tikka masala. The chicken was tough it tasted old. I had to throw it out. I am very disappointed.
Food and service was amazing! We will definitely be back.  P.S. The Samosas made me gassy 💨
Chai tea delicious. Hostess Zeanna fantastic!
Amazing food. Amazing service.
Perfect dinner! Veggie madras & chicken tikki marsala...delicious!! Garlic Naan bread also wonderful! Great service and very nice ambiance. This is my favorite restaurant in the Cape! ❤️
Amazing Indian food and must-visit :-)
Wonderful place to eat.

The food is excellent, I’m from California and have very high standards for Indian food. This is the best Indian food I’ve had in Florida and is comparable to my favorite Indian restaurants in California.  Joelle was my server and she was perfect. I have no complaints and will be back again soon.

My girlfriend and I stopped in here over the weekend to have lunch. What we experienced was one of the more enjoyable lunches that we have had in recent recollection. The food was extremely flavorful, but not overpowered. The food can be spicy, but it can also be made more mild if you prefer. It is extremely clean the staff was very welcoming and a pleasure to speak with. They have a wide range of foods including vegetarian options. We will definitely be back soon!

The owner, Sudev, is very professional and courteous. He loves to greet his customers and make sure they are satisfied. The service is always phenomenal, too. It is always a pleasurable experience. Best Indian food in the area, hands down! Get the Vegan Mantra!

We first tried this place during quarantine and it was delish. We have been here 4 or 5 times since and so far every dish we try is so good. It has a nice atmosphere and the prices are good as well as the staff and the owner always comes around and helps with a meal selection. I always get the Korma, which is awesome, but all the others have been good too and they are great to share and try something different. Look forward to our next trip there.

The food was amazing, I love Indian cuisine but I've never seen it so elegantly presented nor so rich in flavor. Very delicious!!! The staff was very sweet too, the waitress I had was very attentive and made thr experience very nice. I believe the owner or manager might have approached us as well and he was very pleasant to talk to.
Great food . Real authentic Indian food . Definite place to check out for any fan of authentic Indian food
It was phenomenal!!!! The server zeanna was absolutely awesome!!! The best server that i have ever had in all of my experience in any restaurant that i have been to.

Quick lunch on our way to Lovers Key. We aren’t new to Indian Cuisine and this was delicious. Garlic naan, excellent!!  Saag paneer, very very good.   My husband liked his curry very much too. O think my favorite thing is you build your own curry. Choose the sauce, add three selections, goat, lamb, chicken, vegetables, and paneer.  Custom curry. Everything was delicious!  Wish we were local.
Excellent & flavourful food, great service and friendly owners!  We are repeat customers.
Wow Delicious! My second visit and can’t wait to return, the staff is very helpful with suggestions on menu and very friendly .Great food Great service.

My first visit. Nice looking place. Waiter was very friendly and knowledgeable. Answered all my questions and recommended the best appetiser. Who would think cauliflower was that great. Will definitely go back. Excellent flavors in the sauces and each dish. When they say it is hot. It is hot.
Love this restaurant and the employees are great. One of my favorite places to eat in Cape Coral!

Very impressed. The owner came around to check on all patrons and make light conversations, nice to see. The food was outstanding.  We ordered butter chicken and paneer. The spice and flavor were perfect, the Basmati rice was aromatic and flavorful.  We also ordered the onion naan and garlic naan, yum, perfectly made. They have a very complete menu with alot to offer. Wine and beer selection complemented the food offerings very well. We will be back many times over. They also have a 22 OZ Taj mahal bottle of Indian beer....I highly recommend it. Our server,  Hannah was very attentive, friendly and quite helpful.

This place is amazing every dish I have ordered is always 10 out of 10 I don't think you could have a bad meal here. Staff are friendly and place has a good energy inside hard to find that in most places. My ultimate favorite is the (chettinad) medley with goat,lamb,and chicken
The food was great and the only thing better than it was their playlist! Recommend going here!!

Food is amazingly delicious. We’ve been here for 2 valentines in a row now and the 4 course they offer for the special occasion is fantastic! Leaves plenty of room for a little wine. The regular menu is also very good. The owner/manager is also very nice and made a point to stop at every table.

We have dined here snd have also done takeout. We are so happy this wonderful place has survived!  When you dine in, the servers are so gracious and the food is fabulous!  Everything is hot and fresh.  Our favorites are chicken tiki, Chan’s Masala and Kashmiri naan. Today we are celebrating Valentine!s Day with takeout from here. Unlike most takeout food, this is just as good at home as it is in the restaurant.  Good job!

Masala Mantra is the real deal , I enjoyed every dish I had there . The service is impeccable . I had the special grill I really enjoyed it . The ambience is classy and elegant . I am not surprised to see Masala Mantra as the number 1 restaurant in Cape Coral . I wish them the best
We had 5 different dishes, every one was scrumptious! Excellent food. Can’t wait to go back.
Wow! Great Indian Food. Do your taste buds a favor and get some food from this restaurant. Bravo Masala Mantra!

Our first time ordering from this restaurant and it will not be the last! We did take out but will certainly dine in next time. The food is sooo good. 5 star good. We ordered samosas...which came with tamarind sauce and a delicious green chili sauce. Curry shrimp which was so flavorful and the shrimp were big and cooked perfectly. Chicken Korma!!! one of my favorite Indian dishes but I've never had a Korma like this.  The sauce was almost floral tasting, so good,  can't wait to order it again. The rice that came with was perfectly cooked and fragrant.  The GARLIC NAAN bread, I think we will order 2 next time and take it home for snacks. After we ate I called the restaurant to thank them for the delicious dinner and to let them know how good it was. The gentleman on the phone was very humble and thanked me....he said they are a small business trying to stay in business. Support this place, you won't regret it!! Probably will be eating here next week!
Fantastic food and very friendly staff always have a great time there

(Translated by Google) The best Indian food in a long time. The service was very nice and he explained the dishes very well. There was also a yoghurt cucumber sauce if the food was too spicy. The owner was also very friendly, as was the conversation with him, where he inquired about the satisfaction. It seemed very clean and nicely decorated. I would go there again anytime.  (Original) Seit langem das Beste indische Essen. Die Bedienung war sehr nett und er hat die Gerichte sehr gut erklärt. Es wurde auch eine yoghurt Gurken Sauce angeboten, falls das Essen zu scharf sei. Auch der Besitzer war sehr freundlich, genau wie das Gespräch mit ihm, wo er sich über die Zufriedenheit erkundigt hatte. Es wirkte sehr sauber und schön eingerichtet. Dort würde ich jederzeit wieder hingehen.
Excellent Indian food. The naan bread was incredible and so was everything else. Friendly service
Delicious
Atmosphere, staff, and food was all amazing. We will be going back!
For an authentic, traditional curry, look no further! The best curry in Cape Coral, bar none! If you haven't tried it, you should!
Delicious! Lots of good Vegan options here.

Masala mantra is your answer to the Best Indian Restaurant in the Cape and Fort Myers area. I’ve ordered multiple times from here and every time the food has been flavourful and true to the taste. Some of my must tries are: Gobhi Manchurian, Samosa Chaat, Keema Naan, Garlic Naan, Butter Chicken, Chicken Jalfrezi and the Traditional Curry. The quantities are generous and the spice levels are totally customizable. After multiple orders I can safely say, you can never really go wrong with any of the items at Masala Mantra. Kudos to the team for a fab and consistent job always!

My wife and I returned after having Covid-19 and as usual found the food was excellent. Everything came out hot and delicious. The owners took time to walk around and greet the patrons to make sure everything was perfect. Takeout service was very busy but did not diminish the serving time or food prep. Highly suggest going here.

If you’re in the mood for Indian cuisine this is the place! The food and service were excellent and very enjoyable.  The staff was very helpful with menu choices.  I have been eating Indian food for 3 decades and this is in my top 10 favorite restaurants. Highly recommended.
Very friendly, attentive, and great food!
We love the chicken tiki masala and the plain Naan.  We have been ordering delivery and decided to try dine in tonight.

Best Indian food in SWFL! All of the food is excellent and authentic, you are sure to enjoy whatever you order. The service is always good, and everyone is very friendly. If you’re looking for great Indian food, this is exactly where to go.
Great food!
Best Indian food I've ever had. Staff was superb 👌 and very prompt 👍. If your in the mood for something different and new, you must try this place out. Ill definitely be back!
Everyone enjoyed their food greatly in our party.  Service was outstanding and we were treated very well.  Highly recommend.

We absolutely love Indian food and we lived in Asia for a very long time. Masala Mantra is amazing, I just tried to leave a review on UberEats as we ordered on UberEats but I couldn’t figure it out. I couldn’t go to bed before leaving a review. The food is amazing, we ordered a little more as we will enjoy our Indian food  breakfast tomorrow morning, call us weird, I don’t care, Indian food is not only for dinner :)  We make sure to order from this restaurant every week once, they never disappoint, never had the chance to dine there as we don’t go out to eat anymore due to Covid but as a couple who absolutely adore the people, the culture and the cuisine in India, we recommend this beautiful restaurant, can not wait to go and wine and dine one night when this is all over. Thank you 🥰
Top notch Indian cuisine! My family and I love coming here. We are vegan and they offer plenty of delicious options for us. The staff is always friendly and the service is great.
Best Indian Restaurant in town!! Great Service!!!
Love this authentic Indian cuisine

I have been enjoying Indian cuisine for the past 3 decades, and If you’re in the mood for Indian food, or are trying this kind of food for the 1st time, this is your place! The food was delicious  and authentic. The service  excellent,  and the staff is friendly and accommodating. Highly recommended.

Absolutely delicious! Authentic Indian cuisine! If you like Indian, this is the best place to go!... Worth the drive. Clean comfortable dining environment, beyond excellent table service all for a reasonable price!
Absolutely delicious. Service was perfect. A very calming atmosphere. Great food, great service, restaurant was immaculate. Clean as a whistle. Will be going back next week😊

OUTSTANDING! Authentic Indian Cuisine with an amazing customer service. Food is next level-up. I have been in multiples Indian restaurants (Austin, Nashville, Houston), and let me confirm that Masala Mantra is the BEST! You MUST try once and I'm pretty sure you'll be back. I will for sure! Decoration is awesome and they make you feel as a family!
Great place great service
Nice place.  Service was great.  Food good.  The Kashmiri Naan bread was really too sweet.  Other than that, everything was good. Friendly and accommodating also.
Great food and great service.

The service at Masala Mantra was excellent,  and the food was okay. Why just okay? Well you go for the "masala" meaning a blend of spices. The Gobi Manchurian was crispy but not a lot of the sweet and spicy sauce that makes the dish. We got medium heat and everything from the Lamb Rogan Josh to the grilled chicken (which was  lukewarm) was kinda bland.  The lamb chops and total of 2 shrimp we got on our mixed grilled platter were  well seasoned. There was an inexplicable pile of broccoli on our grilled meats. We took most of it home, hit everything with some spices and had it for dinner tonight. Naan was great, and masala chai was delicious. Next time we will ask for spicy!
Spicy, hot dishes.
Clean place great help but the food is not my cup of tea sorry
Super nice place, great experience. Staff was very kind, good knowledge of the menu. Food was great, price was right. Whenever I'll be back in the area, I will definitely stop by again.

This was my second time to visit Masala Mantra and again the food and service was wonderful. The staff were very busy but cheery and full of energy so that you felt well monitored during the meal.  We started with Keema - spice and flavor was just right; I chose Rogan Josh Lamb and my daughter Saag Paneer, we both shared garlic naan. I have been to India twice for 10+ days for work. This food is as good, if not better than I would get in Indian restaurants in India.  Fantastic job bringing authentic flavors to Cape Coral.

😍😍😍😍Waaw, such a good food and good place. I went to this place with my family and this was the first time I have visited. We haven't kept any expectations and simply went over, ordered food. The food came and it met "BEYOND THE EXPECTATIONS".Such a lovely food and it was 😋😋. I would like to recommend everyone to visit this place in Cape coral ,Florida.
Amazing
Perfection every time!!!!
Outstanding!  I'm a bit new to this genre of cuisine and I am blown away by the tastes/textures!  Best Indian food I've ever eaten.  Literally.

Sooo tasty! We were visiting town and order takeout twice because it was so good. We had bhindi do pyaza, aloo gobi, malai kofta, samosa chaat, rotis and everything was perfection. It was cool that they specifically call out any vegan option. Would highly recommend!
Great food.
First time trying the Indian food . Looks like I will be having more . Very flavorful food . Their customer service is amazing ! Highly recommend this place .
We really enjoyed the food, the price & service here.
Amazing service!  Wonderful food.  Excellent vegetarian options.

Amazing authentic Indian food!! The staff was incredibly helpful and accommodating of food allergies. The combination of great food and friendly service makes this spot a cape coral gem. Whether you love Indian food or you're new to the cuisine, you'll enjoy this restaurant.

Wonderful addition to the exotic dining palate in Cape Coral ! Curries, Biriyanis, all rice dishes, nans, etc are all delicious. During this Pandemic I ordered on-line and drove there to pick up. And now 4 times later we had a wonderful dinner each time. And the staff is nice and accommodating. Once we get past this Pandemic we are looking forward to dine at the restaurant.
I've been here three times in the past two weeks.  The food and service is excellent!  I recommend the vindaloo if you enjoy very spicy with a great flavor!

The food at Masala Mantra is beyond amazing. It is extremely flavorful, colorful and sure to send your taste buds on an experience! The staff is just as great. They are welcoming, friendly, smiley, professional and very attentive. The environment is so relaxed you will surely feel right at home. Whether you go for a romantic evening, a night with friends or family, you won’t regret the selection to experience Masala. You will want to return the next day. Thank you for the amazing experience, great job and see you soon!

This is not authentic Indian cuisine. I ordered 6 different meat dishes and also a Dahl and everything was a bowl of liquid with a couple chunks in it. The chicken in the butter chicken had bones and grizzle and the lamb was quite chewy, not tender as it should be. The regular rice that comes with the meals was soggy. Not to mention I paid a LARGE price for my order. I have had amazing Indian cuisine from a different place in Port Charlotte. Too bad it’s farther away. If you want an authentic experience try a different place.
Great food. Friendly staff will take the time to explain anything to you. Food is some of the best I've ever had.

The food was excellent. Our waiter Chase was very attentive, and answered all of our questions about each dish. The restaurant was tastefully decorated and the wonderful smell of Indian food greets you as soon as you open the door. This was a welcome change from our regular choices for eating out, and we look forward to returning.

Food was ok. They forgot half our order, but refunded us. The portion to cost is not very good and seems overpriced compared to other Indian restaurants in the area for what you get with your order. The food is good and is seasoned well.

This is the best Indian food I have ever had and I have tried many places. I always get the paneer tikka and fried cauliflower. I am a vegetarian and  they have many vegetarian options including the paneer tikka masala, they are very accommodating with their food. Friendly staff, awesome owners, and all around amazing restaurant. Highly recommend!
Excellent food but the online ordering menu does not work anymore as it only lists 3 possible meals.
Food is always amazing as is the service. Never a disappointment.
The food is superb! The onion and cilantro naan is outstanding. The food is just excellent.
Such a good place, delicious food, great and friendly staff. Thank you
Without doubt the highest quality Indian food we have tasted since leaving England 20 years ago. It will not disappoint!

I haven't had a perfect Vindaloo since I left Chelsea in London. The chef has found a perfect balance of art here. It's culinary art to the top level. It's rare to find a place like this anywhere on the planet. If you haven't had the best London curry then welcome to Cape Coral of all places which has it.

It was excellent! We haven't had Indian food since moving from Michigan and this was delicious 😋. Our service was great. Our server was very knowledgeable and helpful, giving suggestions and honest opinions. I would recommend this place to everyone!
One of my favorite spots to eat. fantastic location, always clean, and fantastic service. Keep it up!
Great food. The mild is still spicy. But its great overall. Get the cauliflower apps.
Great authentic Indian food. Fresh and delicious 😋

Food was fantastic, I got the butter chicken and garlic naan. Had to wait a little bit for our food but it was fresh and worth the wait. I believe our waiter was chase and he did an awesome job. Would highly recommend.
Great authentic Indian dishes. Garlic naan.  Omg.

Incredibly delicious. Indian the way it should be prepared. Tender, flavorful, exotically seasoned. Served with care and warmth. Generous portions. Must try. So many options - every palate can find its perfect taste.
Excellent quality of food.
I give this place double thumbs up. Nothing but pleasant experiences here. This place has a good design.
Great food great service.  Will come back and definitely recommend
Great food, clean place. Wonderful host, and owner. I highly recommend this place, especially during covid. Love the service.❤️❤️❤️❤️
Wonderful food and friendly service. Becoming one of our favorite dinner spots in the Cape for dine-in or takeout. My favorite is their butter chicken. And the staff really goes over and beyond.
Really good food. Full of flavor and prepared well.

Incredible food, a great Indian beer (Taj Mahal). Shared a chicken Masala and some somasas, with an order of garlic man bread. Still had leftovers for tomorrow's lunch. Can't wait to go back, plan on eating my way through the entire menu...

Everything about our experience was absolutely above and beyond any expectation. First, the service! Five stars all the way around for being warm, attentive and willing to give recommendations. The food. Wow. So fresh, flavorful-the best Indian food I’ve ever had. The butter chicken was incredible. We savored every bite. The atmosphere was inviting. Thank you and we can’t wait to come back!
Amazing place. I had chicken tikamasala, Garlic naan and samosas. If you are in the area, this is a must go. The waiter and all the personnel is amazing, kind and knowledgeable.
Super delicious. Will be back. Must visit if you haven’t been. Try everything. Go home happy and with leftovers.
Best Indian food I've ever had!
Amazing flavors! The food is amazing and the service is GREAT!!!
Amazing food crafted with care. Super friendly staff, I suspect they are going to need a bigger parking lot soon.
The food and service was outstanding! We would definitely recommend Masala Mantra for some good Indian food.
Yummy and Authentic food always. I keep going.

Outstanding!!! I just discovered Masala Mantra although it's been around for about a year.  Great food.  Great quality, good size portions, authentic Indian cuisine.  The restaurant is new, modern, roomy.  Very nice.  If you like Indian food or want to try, this is a great places.  Dishes can be modified to be mild, medium or spicy.  Looking forward to future meals from Masala Mantra.
Best Indian food ever 😋

Excellent Dining Experience! Our server, Chase, was very helpful in making recommendations based on our tastes and helping us navigate through the nice assortment of drinks, appetizers and entrees. The food was very good, he wore a mask and we were seated away from others. We felt very comfortable while we enjoyed the delicious meal and the entire dining experience. We’ll definitely be going back!

This is now my favorite restaurant. The moment you walk through the doors your nose is filled with an enticing aroma of wonderful spices. The food was fantastic! The manager was so warm and welcoming it was as if he was hosting us from his house. Bobby even spoke to me about my preferences and catered to my nutritional needs. The atmosphere was inviting and peaceful. And the food was aromatic, complex in flavors, with perfect spicing that awakens my pallet. My mom got the lamb chops that were to die for. They were coated in a beautiful meldoy of flavors in the dry rub and cooked to a perfect tender texture. I got the the tikki masala (the first menue item) it was so creamy and wonderful. The chicken was cooked perfectl, juicy and flavorful. The cooked in rose water and coconut very subtly but such a perfect touch. We also got onion Nan bread. The bread had a delectable buttery outside and sweet onions throughout the fluffy Nan bread. We also got cauliflower that was cooked to perfection it fooled my husband and I to thinking it was chicken.

Great food! Helpful staff.   The only downside is the parking and location.   I drove right by it trying to find the entrance.   It sneaks up on you.  Would be nice to have another entrance from the back of the building where there is more parking.
Amazing food!!! Awesome Service!!

Excellent food and great service. My friend and I went tonight to dinner. I had the lamb Rogan Josh, and she had the lamb Tikka Masala. They were both incredible, and very fresh. She ordered samosas for an appetizer. I normally don’t like Samosas, but these were incredible. This place was a good find off of google , and we weren’t disappointed. I’m definitely going back again . They also did a great job of social distancing , and very self aware of masks on the servers. Also reasonably priced with nice size orders . We had lots of leftovers.
Good food & service. The have an excellent menu & our meals were excellent.  We'll definitely be back again.
Had the butter chicken with Naan and rice. Awesome service and staff was wearing masks. Food was delicious. Will go back again if I'm in the area.
Best food ever. So delicious.
Amazing dinner tonight! Thank you!  Best Indian food in a long time. Serious professionals in their kitchen!
This is the most amazing Indian food. A large variety to choose from. The atomosphere and service are great. It does not get any better than this!! I would highly recommend!!!
Best Indian food in Lee county

It's a bit troublesome to spot because its digital signage is shared with some other shops, but the food is delicious, the service is excellent, and the interior ambiance is quite nice. The naan, Manchurian Cauliflower, Malai Kebab, and Paneer Jalfrezi were all absolutely excellent. Our waiter, Chase, was particularly good.
Hands down, my new favorite place in the Cape! The food was amazing, so flavorful, colorful and full of life 💚 the service was great as well, very friendly. We will be back again!
And excellent food definitely come here again

Okay so I came here just on a whim with my Mom and Dad; didn’t expect much but was greeted with amazing service from a young waiter named Chase I believe. Excellent service from him! He made the menu incredibly easy to understand and when the food came out we were amazed at how good it was. Hands down best Indian food I have ever had. If you are not sure if you like Indian food or not this is the place you should go and try it out at. I had the Jalfrez with Lamb; 10/10 recommendation on that dish!

First time at Masala Mantra, butter chicken, rogan josh with lamb, naan bread and briyani -  all wonderful and flavorful.  Love that you can choose mild, medium or spicy.  We tried all three.  Entrees are full size so we have wonderful left overs.  Beautiful and calm interior and great service.

Amazing food!!!  Normally I don’t rate restaurant About their food quality and taste. This place made me feel I have to write something good about them. Being Indian I alway look for good Indian food in Florida  that I used to eat back home, this place by far best Indian food You can find around here.

Cute little gem of a restaurant in Cape Coral. Great menu with descriptions for people who have never tried Indian cuisine before. Knowledgeable and attentive staff, delicious food full of bold flavors and generous helpings. Our group really enjoyed the Samosa Chat, the garlic Naan, the Malai Kebab, the shrimp Jalfrezi, and the chicken Biriyani.

I just have a question. What days and times & cost is your buffet. I’m interested in the buffet so I can try a little bit of everything. I haven’t eaten Indian food for years so I’m really trying to remember all the names of different dishes that I loved. I moved here from Virginia over 10 years ago. I had a few Indian restaurants that I absolutely loved an went to all the time. But here in Florida Good Indian food is hard to come by. So I’m really hoping your buffet will be as tasty as my favorites in Virginia. Wishing you all the Best! Anna Basye

We had the pleasure to dine in Masala Mantra last night. We decided to try it based on the many awesome reviews that we read. In my opinion, this restaurant deserves every great review it has received. We decided to go with one unique dish and one standard, so we ordered the grilled lamb chops and the chicken tiki masala. And of course we paired this with some garlic naan. Our meal was outstanding, the soft music was delightful, and our hosts were very friendly. You should definitely try this restaurant; you will not be disappointed!

In the short time since they have opened masala mantra India bistro has become my go to Indian restaurant in this area. In addition to tasting  authentically Indian , we also enjoy the hospitality this place offers for dine in . The team is very  professional, attentive, polite and quick.. Our favorite is Rogan Josh , baby corn Manchurian and kadai paneer with mouth watering buttery  garlic naan bread(  my 4 yr old loves their paneer kurchan from their hidden menu )  . The best part is they can customize their dishes to suit my preference without losing the signature of the dish.  Being originally from India masala mantra is the best Indian restaurant in all of SWFL. Way to go Bobby and team!

My wife and I wanted to eat India food like if were at Disney world.. Pick take this place because it was down the street from our house and did I pick a good choice. The food was amazing Staff was very helpful and also nice.If you’re craving Indian food go check this place out.
Fantastic food and service
Great customer service from Bobby excellent food
Love the Chicken Tikka Masala!!! Always friendly and accommodating. Great place to eat. Very clean. I tried a couple other items on the menu and wasn't as excited about them as the Tikka masala.

Went there for dinner tonight as a family of four. Everyone really enjoyed the restaurant even the kids. Had the Flatbread with garlic which was delicious.  Manchuria gobi and chicken as well as madras paneer. Atmosphere was great 👍 and service was spot on.  Glad we gave it a try. We will definitely be back.

Thank you for your reply. The only thing to make it 5 stars would be a little more selection on the menu to choose from. Otherwise the food was very tasty  and the staff were very friendly. Thank you.

I was visiting the area and decided to give the restaurant a try. I highly recommend it. We went for dinner and decided to go back two days later to grab some lunch for our drive to Orlando.  If you don't want too spicy go for mild. Delicious food and service!
Amazing food and service . Authentic Indian food that you won’t find anywhere .

The best . Try their tandoori pompano and Keral fried calamari . This two dish you won’t find in any other Indian restaurant and it deserves 10 stars . Would definitely  recommend this place . Thank you for your amazing food and service .
Best Indian restaurant in fort myers .
Authentic Indian Food with quick and courteous service. The menu covers a wide variety of North Indian and South Indian options.

We had another fantastic meal at Masala Mantra. The food is always fresh and the service is impeccable. Our new favorite Indian restaurant in SWFL. Saag chicken, Gobi, garlic naan and samosas, OH MY full belly!!
Food is not authentic Indian..
Butter chicken with coconut rice was decadent.
Great food and service.
I highly recommend Masala Mantra. It’s my second time here and the naan, Tiki Masala and samosas are so tasty and delicious. One of the best restaurants of Cape Coral.
I want a tandoori oven. Onion naan was to die for.

Some of the best Indian food I have had in the U.S. Got a cauliflower appetizer that was awesome and was spicy enough to make me feel it. Also got a fish curry dish that had a lot of flavor. I would have liked a little more heat, but I am sure the next time I go I can tell them to make it a little spicier and it will be awesome.

I have been on assignment since June 15 2020 so I waited until 6/26/20 to go into the restaurant. Beautiful atmosphere. No alcohol but beer and wine. I ordered Pakora, Samosa Chat, Bombay Lamb Chops, Saag with goat meat, Aloo Gobi Marsala and the Lamb Biriyani. Wow, unbelievable fantastic aroma and flavor. This place made me forget Covid-19
Wonderfully delious.Highly recommend. Lovely atmosphere, good service, reasonable prices. Will tell friend and hope yo go again
Delicious authentic Indian food! The staff were friendly and attentive! We will be back for sure!

The food is great and the waiter is really helpful with the menu. I really enjoy coming here because the food hasn't been disappointing yet. The parking lot is a little small so bring a smaller vehicle or grab an uber.

The food was delicious. We were very pleased with all of the flavors. We ordered take-out; samosas chat, Tikka with vegetables, Naan and Pakora. We would have loved to have Kashmiri rice but they only offer it in the Naan bread. The restaurant ambiance was absolutely beautiful and we can't wait to dine in. They could improve upon the ease of use of their website. Ordering was a bit tricky. The Raita was extremely overpriced at $4/ounce. We will definitely order from there again though. We'll just skip the Raita.
So fresh. So good.  So absolutely worth trying.  It will become your favorite restaurant.
Good good, great service.
The food at this restaurant is delicious.  The owners and staff are very friendly as well.  I would most definitely recommend Masala Mantra- The Indian Bistro
Great food and service

LOVE this restaurant!!  Delicious!!  Very flavorful, fresh and nice size portion.  The spices are wonderful - very authentic.  I am so happy to found a great Indian restaurant in the area!!  We will be back often!

Filling the void in Indian cuisine in Cape Coral with panache and authority, Masala Mantra is legit. Authentic spices are beautifully blended with their genuine customer service and technical skill. Fantastic Vindaloo, Naan, beer and much more. Thank you for your craft!! 👏🏻

Excellent representation of Indian fare. If you have never tried Indian food you must order the Masala Fry chicken appetizer. For entrees, an excellent introduction to this style of cooking is chicken korma, paneer Tikka masala, and the madrasa. Taj Mahal beer is a great light lager that pairs up well with any food you order. This particular establishment offers a couple of Italian beers as well, both of which are excellent. My family will be returning very soon. Also, compared to most other Indian restaurants the prices are certainly reasonable. One entree dish is enough to feed two or three people unless you're REALLY hungry.

Im a high end restaurant operator and have been in the industry for nearly 20 years and a "worldly" foody all my life. I only leave reviews when I have experiences such as this one. All I can say is: Visit and allow the service staff and kitchen to take you into flavor heaven. Authentic flavors, genuin kindness and care that reflect sole passion and detication to excellence in every aspect. WOW, feel the care of the staff and experience what its like to never want to brush your teeth again so the flavors last forever.
Came here with a bunch of my friends, and the food was fantastic!! So delicious and flavorful with a wide variety of options -- all of us rated our meals 5 stars. Definitely recommened!
amazing food, people, atmosphere. 10/10 will eat here again, recommend to anybody wanting to fill that food shaped hole in your soul. a.k.a the shortcut to nirvana

I would like to recommend this restaurant to anyone that is looking for amazing Indian food.  by far the best in the area of Fort Myers ,Cape Coral,  Naples , and Tampa . this was our first time visiting Masala Mantra .  we enjoyed it so much that we ordered to go for all of our friends so they can try it and see what we just discovered . Few years ago my wife and I were in NYC we in an upscale Indian restaurant name “ Tamarind Tribeca “ and we can easily say that we found a better tasting food with a much better prices here in Cape Coral Florida ( who would believe... ) . We are very foodie people and we always go to restaurants ,  but this the first review we ever wrote !!!!  Also worth mentioning , we have a friend that only eats Halal meat , and this restaurant serves Halal meat , so now we can take our friend and he can enjoy it with us  , because other Indian restaurants in the area are not Halal .  To the restaurant staff: Thank you so much for the great service and a great experience.
Delicious food! First time trying Indian food and I loved it. The chicken lollipop and chicken bites were tasty. And the garlic naan is my favorite :)
Some of the best Indian food I've ever had!!! Spectacular!
First time eating Indian food and this place was absolutely delicious. Service was fantastic, food was fresh, and came out quickly. Highly recommend eating here.
This place is always absolutely delicious and the staff are always freindly.

This place was a 5 star restaurant one point, but like most places after the first few months things head south, this is unfortunate because growing up spending a lot of time in the UK I've eaten my fair share of Indian food, and i don't remember bone shards in all of the chicken dishes, this is a dangerous matter and due to using leftover tandoori chicken from there lunch buffet in most chicken dishes we get these painful surprises in our food i really hope this is taken into consideration in the future, i mean someone could really hurt them selves biting down or swallowing one of these.
I love this place. Excellent service, great food. I mean really great food! This is now on my list of places I regularly go to. I love everything about this place.

Overall the food is fantastic.  Ordered some takeout the other day and when I got home I noticed that the vindaloo curry was extremely spicy.  Now, I know it’s supposed to be spicy and I’m into spicy food but this was next level hot.  I called them to let them know how hot it was in case that batch was made a little hotter than normal so it wouldn’t bother other customers.  They offered to replace it I said no that’s OK.  They even offered to deliver another meal for free.  I really didn’t want any compensation I was just letting them know in the case that somebody who was less tolerant of of a spicy dish ordered it.  I thought that would be the end of it and they had wonderful customer service in offing to compensate even though I refused it.  However, a couple of days later I notice a refund to my bank for the dish.  I didn’t even give them my name.  This is definitely above and beyond customer service!
The chicken Phaal was outstanding.

Amazing food, I would say it’s the best Indian Restaurant in the Naples-Ft Myers-Cape Coral area!! Humble place with bold flavors, worth every penny!!! Please stay the same as you grow with success 👍🏼💪🏼!!

Wow! Please don't pass the restaurant gem by. The owners and staff are incredibly friendly, and help to explain the dishes, with detailed information about the delicate spices they use in their entrees.We went with our waiter's recommendations, and everything was phenomenal.  The entire restaurant smells SO GOOD!
DELICIOUS!  The food was so, so good.  Incredible flavors, very fresh, good service. Neat and clean restaurant.  It was our first time here and definitely will not be our last.
Love the food and the staff - we have never been disappointed here! They always go above and beyond to make you feel at home and the food is always outstanding. We love coming here!
Excellent food and great service! My personal recommendation is the Manchurian cauliflower, you won't regret trying. I cannot wait to go back.
We love this place and are so happy they opened in Cape Coral. The food and service is excellent and the staff are warm and accommodating.

My family is in love with this restaurant, they have many of our favorite entree's. The staff is great, the place is spotless. The only negative is Doordash doesn't deliver in our area, we would definitely order more often if it did.

3 of us dined this evening..The food was superb..the service was exquisite..1 small issue.. 1 of the 3 plates of food came out "Cold"..when notified of issue the staff was quick to rectify...and as a bonus we were not charged for that plate..That is the mark of professionalism..Thank you for a wonderful meal..and an enjoyable evening...
Standing Ovation!!! Fresh incredible dishes. Upscale homey environment. Friendly attentive staff.

The food was fantastic! You walk in and cant help but notice all the amazing aromas and spices.  Nice little restaurant for a date night or they have a small bar if you are alone.  The service was very attentive and the prices seem fair.  Will definitely try more dishes soon!

Food is fabulous.  There were six of us in our group.  We all ordered something different and shared.  The owners and staff are extremely helpful and ready to explain and assist with choices.  If you enjoy Indian cuisine...do not pass on this great establishment.  If you're new to Indian food...do not pass on this establishment either!

Wow, just fantastic food and great atmosphere! Staff was incredible ! This is a must go to restaurant, bring your friends and family you won't be disappointed. I love this place, dang that food was so good !
First visit...excellent food and service...we will be going back soon!
Excellent customer service and great tasting food.
The food is good, and staff very nice.

Hands down best Indian Food!! Staff/Owner was friendly and attentive.  Food was impeccable, flavors, presentation and delivery are on point. Samosa Chat is to die for!! Curry, vindaloo, Tikki you won’t be disappointed.  Take out is as remarkable as dinning in.
Fantastic food.
Wonderful lunch buffet!
Waiter is very knowledgeable. Food is very good. Good experience overall. Highly recommend the appetizer pictured here - onion pakora.
Second time here, absolutely awesome !
Food and service was AMAZING!!  Can’t wait to go back.
Very good indian. Highly recommend the tikka masala. Service was quick. Parking can be a bit tricky though.
Great food, good selection of south Indian food. One of the best In SW Florida. Great service.

The only regret I have is I didn't take a photo of our dishes. The food here is authentically delicious. Buttery chicken was delightful and full of flavor. Tandoori chicken was equally tasteful and moist. Highly recommend eating here especially for those Cape Coma inhabitants who should expand their taste buds.

I absolutely love Indian cuisine. I even attempt it at home. The tikka masala I had last night here was not only one of the best Indian dishes I’ve ever had, it was one of the best meals I’ve ever had!! Hubby loves spicy and boy did he get his challenge.  Can’t wait to go back!

I am a carnivore, unabashedly a meat eater. So why do I keep ordering the vegetarian dishes at Masala Mantra Indian Bistro? Because they are just that good! I’m being healthy by accident rather than design and I love it. This place is a must; the staff is so gracious and attentive. Eating here is an all around joy.
Always the best. Very consistent the food is perfect.

Oh man. The lunch buffet was so good! A nice variety of options, meats and vegetarian. Very flavorful and well spiced. The staff was attentive and friendly, lots of smiles and warmth. I can't wait to go back for their dinner menu 💙

We went with another couple, for our first visit, Sunday evening and shared 4 main dishes, 4 appetizers and 2 kinds of Naan bread. i have to say that all of us agreed that it couldn’t have been any better and one of us was from India. The other good news was that our server, Karan Kalia, did an outstanding job of taking care of us. I would highly recommend this place.

Definitely my favorite Indian restaurant in Lee County (and I've been to all of them). Super friendly staff, all of the servers have been amazing. Food is incredibly fresh. The owner is great. Everything about this place is perfect!

My fiance and I stopped in here from out of town for takeout. We've eaten a lot of Indian food from across the country, and their chicken tikka masala is the best we've ever had! It was so sweet, with a slight heat in the aftertaste (we got the mild). The samosas had a great heat to them to balance it out, and the garlic naan was loaded with flavor. On top of that, they were very accomodating of my fiance's peanut and nut allergy. We wish you had a restaurant in Michigan so that we could go there all the time!
Very welcoming staff & environment. Great selection of entrees. Food is very tasty. Looking forward to going again.
Fast and great service. Very friendly. Food was great.
Excellent food and service to match. Highly recommend and will be returning for another amazing meal. Thank you for a wonderful experience!
My waitress Sheree was great, the food was delicious, will recommend to all my friends💕

Great food, great service, great atmosphere. The vindaloo is NO JOKE (spicy!), but still delicious. The saag was perfect! Such a great addition to the Cape. We hope to meet the owner on our next visit to congratulate him on a such a superb restaurant. We can't wait to try more menu items!!
Great hole in the wall Indian Restaurant!
Excellent food, beverage and service!  Sheree was a super server!   Highly Recommended.   Mike Cartales & Betty Jo Ferguson.
Amazing, just amazing food. In love 😍
Super yummy food and great service!
Found my old friend Sudev.  Excellent!
A limited menu but they do a fantastic job of what they cook. Definitely home cooking.
This place has many vegan options. Come during the buffet and find clear vegan labels on many varieties. They even have a separate vegan menu, best food in the cape!
The food was first rate as well as the service. I can't recommend one dish over another because it's all good.

I am not sure when to start - it was ALL amazing! Truly, from the appetizer s (who knew they could do that to cauliflower!) to the entries - we all tried each other's!! Do notuss this place!! The entire staff were delightful, too!!!
Great Indian lunch buffet. A little more expensive than most of the other lunch  buffet's on Del Prado, but very good
The food here is incredible. Amazing flavors and service! I can't wait to go back. The Chicken Tandoori was my favorite and the warm garlic Naan bread is out of this world.

What a great experience! The service was truly wonderful, but the FOOD was FANTASTIC and what a good deal! Go for the lunch buffet if you get the chance. The Garlic Naan was a table favorite (photo included).  Can't wait to come back for dinner! 10/10 Highly recommend!!

Wow, first time here and it is now on my top 2 restaurants for Cape and FM area. We had the Kasmiri naan. This naan is hard to find in most India restaurants. It was excellently crafted with nuts, dates, and honey. We also tried the Somasosa and was also excellent with a little spice kick. I'm not a spice lover and found it quit tasty.  For dinner, we had lamb curry mild and Shrimp Biryani medium spice. Wife thought the medium was too spicy for her but I thought it was perfect. So order mild if you are not used to India spices.  For desert we tried the plate in the photo with 3 balls. Very tasty and sweet. Liked the naan so much, we took 2 extras to go.  The service from Karan was perfect. And the restaurant is modern design and looks new.  If you have a vegan in the family this is a good place to take them. Many options for them. Note, they don't take reservations as of this posting date.  10 out of 10 across the board.

Just had dinner here for first time. Sheree our waitress recommended two meals that were amazing. Had Korma and the Tilkka Masala both with lamb and the flavors are amazing! Appetizer was Samosa Chaat some chick pea appetizer that was delicious!. Great flavors, great food, great service and atmosphere. Definitely coming back!!
We loved this place...first time there. The food was exceptional and the waiter was so friendly and helpful in telling us what is their best dishes..not disappointed. Will go back for sure.

Large variety of dishes on the smallish buffet. Everything was warm and had good flavor. Wish they had brewed iced tea. Had to wait awhile for the check, but we weren't in a hurry. Everyone around us seemed too be enjoying the dishes.
The food is really, really good!

My husband and I dined at Masala Mantra on Sunday and it was amazing! It was my second visit and my husbands' first. We really enjoyed the food and our waiter, Karan, was really cool. My husband and I were debating on where his accent was from...LOL... I won! Karan was very attentive, charismatic, and very helpful with the menu considering my Gluten and Dairy allergies. The atmosphere was great and the bill was VERY reasonable!!! Might be one of our fave spots go forward! :-)
Vegan and vegetarian choices and a friendly staff.

Wife and I went last night. The food was great and we had an awesome server. One of the owners was there and remembered my wide from the previous week and what she ordered! Karan was our server and he was awesome. Super knowledgeable about the menu and he had a great energy. Very pleased with our experience. We will eat there again!
Excellent!!! The food was Delicious!!!, the service was exceptional The prices were reasonable And again, The food was delicious 👌 If you like Indian food This is the place... Just sayin 😀

SO happy that Cape Coral finally has an Indian restaurant! This place is wonderful - we’ve been to both the lunch buffet and dinner and both are fantastic with the nicest staff!  Karan was our server for dinner and he was super knowledgeable and friendly. The food is delicious - we’ve loved everything we’ve tried and will definitely be back many times.

Awesome food Had a very good time, great ambience, and absolutely loved the food , service was great. Masala mantra is my number one go to restaurant in SWFL. There is an air of humbleness and kindness that cannot be replicated elsewhere wonderful service. Keep it up guys
Again Delicious. Tried another new dish Everything tasty!

Highly recommended Masala Mantra! This is the best Indian food I’ve ever had! We ordered the Cauliflower Manchurian, Garlic Naan, and the Masala Mantra Special Grill which gives you a taste of all the wonderful tandoori specialties. All of the meat in the Masala Mantra Special Grill was the tenderest and juiciest meant we have ever had. If I had to pick a favorite it would be the Malai Kebab which is a chicken tenderloin marinated in a blend of almond, cashew, cream cheese and spices cooked in tandoor.  Not only was the food amazing, the service was fantastic! Definitely going back!
Masala Mantra is undoubtedly the best Indian restaurant in the Fort Myers/Cape Coral area. Highly recommend!

Everything about this place is wonderful.  Each member of the staff are not only friendly but engaging and involved in your overall experience.  If you are familiar with Indian cuisine or new to the scene as we are you will love this place.  The aromas, the bits of heat, tenderness of each morsel of meat, the pillowy fresh naan, all combine perfectly to to delight the senses in every possible way.  If you dont know what goes best with what ask.  They know their food and eagerly answer all questions.  Say hi to Bobby because if he is there he will certainly come by your table and spend whatever time he can give getting to know you.  Drop in during lunch and make your way through multiple items on the buffet.  Everything is fresh and delicious and offers the perfect opportunity to try a little of everything or a lot of your favorite(s).  This place is top notch, affordable and a favorite of ours.  Last thing...  Get the Manchurian cauliflower!!!  Out of this world delicious!
Real good food and friendly staff, will go back

Just excellent! Service was better than you would expect at a good restaurant and the food was just superb.  Indian food has many flavours from the many spices an herbs used and it is the blend of these flavours that deliver a surprising and flavourful experience for the palate.  This is Indian cuisine and you can find all these experiences here in Cape Coral, surprising but true.

The owner Sudev is a hard worker and extremely generous to all of his patrons.  The food was absolutely amazing and top tier quality indian cuisine. We took a leap and tried the goat biryani and was more than pleased. Wasnt a single bad thing in my experience!!! I wish nothing but success for this new restaurant. Highly recommend!!!

I usually do not eat Indian Food, but decided to try Masala Mantra with a friend today for lunch. We were warmly welcomed and sat instantly. I decided to try the lunch buffet while my friend stuck with her usual Butter Chicken. The The tiki masala and naan bread were amazing. Id highly suggest trying Masala Mantra if authentic Indian cuisine is what you are looking for.
We Came in today for the first time and let me just say the food does not disappoint! I love everything about this place and service from Karan was great too.

Was vacationing in the Fort Myers area and after a few days the craving for some comfort food took us on the hunt for an Indian restaurant. This place was highly rated and nearby and we decided to try it. Worth all the positive reviews - great food, great service, nice ambience - everything you would like to have while enjoying a good meal. Will definitely come back.

Brilliant dining experience with a classy ambience and tasty wholesome cooked-to-perfection Indian food. Home away from home experience and strongly recommend to everyone looking for great Indian food in and around the cape.
I felt a sense of love in the way food is made and served in this place.  The Bombay lamb chops were a treat to all my senses.
We love the service, my Bombay lamb chops were phenomenal, and they have an extensive wine list. Best restaurant in Cape Coral !
Awesome place, Been there multiple times. The food is so great ! Must visit

We had waited almost an hour to receive our food. Due to that, we were given a discount on our meal. Once the food got there it wasn't as eventful as I had thought it to be. Mind you, this was my first time eating Indian food and I have to say I wasn't all that impressed. The seasoning was sort of bland. You can't just put curry on food and call it Indian food. The waitress and service in general was pretty good though. I don't know if I would go back. Not because it was a bad experience. Just because it didn't really stand out to me.
Awesome place if you want real indian food! I'd give it much more stars if I could cause that's how great the food is!
The Vindaloo is fantastic and the Tikka Masala! Love this place! Hope it stays in the Cape for a long long time!
Great food, good service, will be back again!
Fabulous Indian food! The ingredients are definitely fresh and authentically delicious. The service was great and the staff was very friendly.
I enjoyed the buffet and the different dishes.

I hate writing this review. I wanted the food to be sooo good but instead it was AMAZING! I just don’t want other people to know if because I fear lines across the bridge to eat here. But the owner was so kind and attentive that to hold back a fantastic review for fear of exposing their greatness would be wrong. So go. Eat. Take it to go. Get delivery (they mentioned future bite squad). Pray they franchise. Pray you can eat Indian again elsewhere. Pray you have leftovers. If so please send them to me because we finished ours entirely. Thanks for raising the bar on food quality in Southwest florida Masala Mantra - remember us hungry little people. ☺️
Very good.. authentic, crisp veg, really nice service..I've very high standards and have been in India for 6 months..

Went to try Indian food other than curry & this restaurant definitely hit my flavor sweet spot. The cauliflower & garlic naan bread alone would've been enough to satisfy but I had to have the mixed grill platter as well which I shared with my sister which was plenty for 2. Go for the flavors & enjoy the ambience.
Lived in India for 4 months and can vouch that this took me back!  The real deal!  Excellent food served by even better people.

My first time to an Indian restaurant in Cape Coral.  Now this has become the top restaurant on my list when I am hungry SWFL.  Sorry Slates, Fish Tale Grill, and Nice Guys you’re still on my list but just not first anymore.  There isn’t anything better then properly spiced Indian food once a week or more. If it’s your first experience trying Indian cuisine, their lunch buffet has multiple dishes to find your favorites.  Or if you’re an Indian food expert let their chief spice it up for you.  This is a new restaurant for Cape Coral but it is one we have needed and I hope you also enjoy.
The food is fantastic and service always excellent.
Excellent food - the servers are very courteous and pleasant. I enjoy the company and highly recommend this place
Love this place!!! So cozy and cute inside. The food is AMAZING and very well priced. The staff is very friendly. I love how involved and friendly the owner is. Definitely coming back!!

We were a party of 4 and we felt so good after a sumptuous dinner. We tried the Priest Ranch cabernet from Napa Valley and it was surreal. The butter chicken lived to my highest expectation..cant wait to bring my friend and family

Best Indian food I had across SWFL. The food is excellent and the service is impeccable. I love  the featured wine . I have been to the Indian restaurants in fort Myers, Naples and  Estero and this gem beats them hands down. I found my ambrosia here & can’t wait to try their lunch buffet .
This place was great. Every dish we had was excellent and full of flavor.
Good quality food served with a smile!
The 5 stars are for the buffet. Every dish presented (tho choices seemed limited) was huge on flavors. This is exactly what I expect from a quality Indian food restaurant. I will be back👍
Excellent food...great service.

This was our first time eating at Masala Mantra Indian Bistro. You first notice how wonderful it smells, so we knew the food was going to be good, and we were not disappointed.  The service was excellent.  Our server was able to explain how each dish was made, with what ingredients and make suggestions.  We had Tikki Masala and Chicken Korma with Garlic Naan.   It was all delicious.  We would not hesitate to order them again.  This is far and away the best Indian food that we have found in Cape Coral or Ft. Myers.

Came in on a Sunday and enjoyed the lunch buffet. They had a lot of options and we were very pleased. We also ordered the chicken lollipops off the menu and liked the sweet & spicy combination.  Glad this restaurant is here in Cape Coral!

FAMILY FRIENDLY -  I am super picky when it comes to restaurants, and finally, I have found an oasis that doesn't cut corners, and as a bonus, they have options for the kids. I am from England, and I make lamb chops all the time, but I have never had them as divine as Mantra #6. I could live on this dish. Plus, as much as I try to culture my kids, they are not apt to trying new dishes. We ordered the kids a mild Masala Fry, and as a backup, we ordered American style chicken nuggets and fries. Let's just say we didn't need the backup, but what a great option for families with picky kids. The ambience is right on; not too loud, not to quiet - a perfect cover for noisy little ones. I am so glad I found this restuarant. We were with another family and also ordered the CK Tikka Masala, LB Rogan Josh, Butter Chicken, Salmon, and desserts. Everyone can't wait to go back. I would definitely recommend it.
Buffet was fresh and refilled continually. Good selection of dishes both chicken and vegetarian. In and out in 45 minutes.

We had a birthday party for 14 for my wife's 65th here. The food is just superb. The service was 1st class and with an air of kindness which has become less frequent here in recent years. They have set a high bar for other Indian restaurants in SW Florida. I rarely have a chance to rate a place five stars. This one truly deserves it. A lot of obvious hard work at play here. And a great addition to Cape Coral options.

I've been wanting to go to this restaurant for a while now. Well, I finally went today. I absolutely loved it. I got the butter chicken, samosas, and naan bread. The food was delicious. Excellent service. I recommend this place if you want authentic Indian food.

Went to Masala Mantra yesterday.  Very different atmosphere when comparing to other SWFL Indian restaurants.  Started off with Gobi Manchurian which was great.  Loved the fact that you can mixed your own Samosa Chaat.  Chicken Tikka Masala gravy was thick and creamy.  Biryani was full of vegetables and rice. Did have an issue with the Aloo Gobi Masala.  Didn't have any gravy to it.  When we told the waitress we didn't like it, she took it back with no questions and didn't charge us.  Bullet Naan was very good.  Dessert was good also.  Very friendly staff.  Place was busy so I would recommend that you do go there a little early.  Would definitely go back again!
Had the lunch buffet...food was fantastic! Service was really good considering how busy they were. 10/10 will come back.
Excellent quality food and friendly service.
Excellent food & service! Many options for vegetarians.
Excellent offerings. Buffet was delicious! Already planning my next visit! Such a welcome edition to Cape Coral.
Delicious, the best indian food in the whole fort Myers area!
Wonderfully spiced dishes with a quaint atmosphere. Definitely worth a visit for Vegan and Non-Vegan customers.

I’ve been to many Indian restaurants and bistros in Cape Coral and Fort Myers, and I can safely say that this is the best out of any I’ve ever been to. The food is absolutely tantalizing (I personally recommend the naan and butter chicken), and the restaurant itself is absolutely beautiful. The staff here is very kind and welcoming. Definitely a must-visit for anybody looking to dine on fine Indian cuisine.

It is so convenient to have an Indian restaurant in the Cape. I have tried many Indian restaurants and this is the best one I have come across. The food is very authentic, fresh and there are no restrictions and least to say the customer service is second to none.  I really wish them well and it is an asset to the Cape.  Well done.
One of the best Indian food I’ve yet had in Florida! The service is phenomenal and the quality of the food, and price are all unbeatable! Go Bobby and team!
Their food is so good. Definitely coming back.

So glad to have a place like this in the Cape !! The food , of course delicious . The decor , very nice. But let’s talk about the customer service , BEST customer service I have ever experienced. I felt so welcomed . Everything on the menu …
It was the best food ever. Went with my friends and we loved it!! Definitely taking my family there. I'll definitely going back, a lot.
Some of the best Indian food I have had in while! Friendly staff, overall great experience (keep it in the Cape!)

This restaurant will be well loved. The atmosphere is inviting and modern. The staff was more than helpful and kind. Best of all, the food. It's obvious that the dishes were prepared with care. The flavors and spices were perfect and everything was delicious. It's safe to say, I'm a fan.
First time for us. Naan breads amazing. Tandoori shrimp and salmon curry also delicious. Server attentive and knowledgeable. We’ll be back!
Must must must must visit Indian restaurant !! Amazing food and awesome service !! Jimmy and sudhev made us feel home
Got Bite Squad tonight, garlic and onion naan was fresh and delicious. Butter chicken was so full of flavor and Chicken Tikka was very tasty. I definitely plan on eating there again.

This place, from the bread to the sauce, to the rice, always goes above and beyond. The flavor is SO much more than any Indian restaurant I've ever been in. They really, really put their skills to the food. Their service is phenomenal and you can't beat the price. Love the environment, staff, and menu. Amazing selection of super sexy dishes 😛. Plan to go, regularly.
Excellent food with vegan options. Highly recommend

Little slice of home for me!.  Prompt and attentive staff,  Tasty &spicy appetizers ( Get the manchurian for sure), Perfectly cooked juicy chicken tandoors.  My wife also seemed to enjoy their Biriyani a lot.  A must visit again for me.
Fresh, tasty vegan food. Attentive, friendly staff. 6/5 stars!
Excellent Indian food. Good range of different menu items. Well worth the visit. About time we had an Indian restaurant in Cape Coral!

I can honestly say this is the best restaurant I’ve been to. You in walk and feel at home. The vibe is classy and comfortable. All of the staff are extremely hard workers that truly care about your experience. The food is exquisite, and everything I’ve had is cooked perfectly, every time I’ve been there. Cauliflower menchurian is the most delicious food they have there. It is a must! The tandoori chicken is also a must if you’re a first time goer.
The Best Indian food I have ever had. Everything was so flavorful. The Tandoori chicken was moist. Chicken tikka marsala hands down my favorite. Can't wait to go back and try Dal and Butter Chicken.
The ambiance is great and the food is flavored well, but it wasn't nearly as spicy as I would expect Indian cuisine to be.  I personally prefer India's Grill in Fort Myers

EXCELLENT CUISINE! AWESOME STAFF! We have been here 3 times and seems to get better every time! Bobby and the staff are always super friendly! So glad an Indian restaurant opened in Cape Coral so we don't have to go to Ft Myers anymore. Ft Myers people - it's worth the trek over the bridge! Keep up the great work guys and see you soon!
The buffet style was very limited for lunch .
Samosaa. Naan. Chicken tikka masala. It was all excellent. Will be coming again soon.
The cauliflower was amazing!!! Great environment and service. Will definitely be back.
I really the place. Great customer service, great food , I will definitely go back with my friends and coworkers so they can experience the great service skills of Adam and Bobby.

My son and I wanted to try this new restaurant (much needed in Cape Coral) I called at 8:35 and spoke to owner, he was so kind and told us to come in even though they close at 9. Made it 7 minutes to 9, phew! My gosh was the food delicious, service outstanding and owner approached our table and you could tell he REALLY appreciated us coming in! We will definitely be back, can't wait! Yum yum
Great food, great service. My friends and I had an amazing experience there!
Supper Indian  food.. try
food was delicious and overall very enjoyed it
Best Indian restaurant in our neighborhood.... authentic Indian food...good service...and liked the ambiance too... would go again for sure...

You wouldn’t think, let me order the Pompano but check out my pics on yelp. Very tasty and don’t be afraid to get it a little spicy. The team is off to a great start and this time we ordered an extra meal...just so I can taste it again the next day. Love this place and the hospitality is spot on.
Loved the overall experience here at Masala Mantra from the food to the ambience .you are treated as family here . This is the best restaurant in the SWFL area . Cant wait to come back.
Super delicious biryani, large portion for 2 meals. Great price for the delicious indian food, best place in Cape Coral

Excellent food!  Great service!   I was pleasantly surprised at how good everything was.  I've traveled the world eating Indian food and this was a great surprise to find this restaurant on Cape Coral.  Will definitely tell everyone about this place.

I love Indian food and I cook great Indian food as well.  I have eaten at many Indian restaurants. My friend and I ate at Masala Mantra this past Monday for the lunch buffet, so we could try several of their dishes. The decor was decent, small and slightly bland, so it did have that "bistro" feel to it.  It was clean, though. The buffet price was very reasonable.  I'll never understand why they put silverware at the beginning of a buffet, though, when you have to carry your plate with one hand and serve with another.  Anyway, the naan bread was good as was the basmati rice(s)- two kinds. The Tandoori chicken however was overcooked and dried out.  The Chicken Tikka Masala was good.  There were no Dal dishes, though. My friend loves the Saag Paneer and it is usually on a buffet, but not this one, so she paid an additional $13 for a small order of it.  We both tried it, and it was very bland, like spinach just out of the blender. Waste of money. There weren't any slivered almonds or golden raisins in the rice dessert either, so it was a little bland also. Service was good. I believe that this restaurant really has some potential though if they would add the proper spices and seasonings to the dishes, and offer the spinach and dal dishes on the buffet. I may give it one more try in a couple of months to see if it's any better, but if not I can just cook it at home.
Beautiful atmosphere. Excellent service! I got saag paneer and naan. It was delicious! So happy that they are close to me in Cape. Will definitely be back!
Delicious food and excellent service! So happy to have this little jewel in Cape Coral!

While my first attempt to try this restaurant was not successful, I am so glad we tried again. Everything we had was so good and there was enough left over for lunch.  We started with the Somoza appetizer and the owner Manchurian cauliflower. Both were well prepared, with flavorful side sauces.  My sister had the traditional lamb curry, which she said was excellent. I couldn’t decide what I wanted so I went with the Marsala Mantra Special Grill.  All the proteins were seasoned beautiful and cooked perfectly.  We didn’t have room for dessert, maybe next time. And there will be a next time.
I loved the butter chicken and the garlic naan. Definitely have to try it. This restaurant just opened and it has great service.
Great food and great service. The entire staff was awesome.

I am SO EXCITED! I’ve lived in Cape Coral for 25 years and I’ve traveled to 17 countries across 5 continents and never have experienced such an authentic and culturally immersive experience as Masala Mantra. The tikka masala is second to …
Best Indian food I've ever had!
Excellent food and spectacular service . very attractive interior

The best Indian food I've ever had!  Fantastic flavors and great heat! Wonderful service! Had the Masala Mantra Special Grill Tandoori Sampler Medium Heat, Garlic Naan Bread,  Samosas Appetizer, and Korma Chicken Hot Heat... Everything was outstanding! I hate lamb and I will order the Lamb Bombay Tandoori  from here again! Everyone was great! I originally called for takeout because it was 30 minutes to closing time.  They insisted we dine in for the best quality food even though it was almost closing time! Everyone was friendly and helpful! Awesome place!
I found the food to be excellent and the service as well they stayed open late to accommodate us. I won't be leaving the cape for Indian food

Ate at Masala Mantra for lunch. Food is very fresh and well-prepared. The restaurant has a separate vegan menu and labels all vegan food on the buffet. Service is very friendly and prices are fair. The place was full when I went, and customers seemed quite pleased. I only wish they served Dosas......

This by far is the finest Indian restaurant in SWFL. Most Indian restaurants for me generally miss out on the interiors but this restaurant has amazing ambience and great soothing Indian music. I went to Masala Mantra on the weekend with my friends- the restaurant was busy with great vibe, which is difficult to find in SWFL. The food was delicious with well balanced spice levels. We ordered veggie pakora, gobhi Manchurian for appetizers and paneer tikka masala with variety naan breads. A must visit place for Indian food lovers!!

Heard the new place in town was very good .so tried it out this wknd with few of my other friends . Great Ambience and food and the staffs were super nice . Enjoyed everything about this place . All the food we ordered were delicious . I know people worry about being it spicy but they have it from very mild to very hot so you can choose . We also loved the Taj beer .we are DEFINITELY coming back for more .

I went with my family last night there for dinner . Ireally like indian food and they met all my expectations. They were really busy we had a wait time but it was totally worth it . The owner was extremely nice . They treated us like a family .will be definitely back . Their butter chicken and Nan bread was topnotch.
I love it here, the food is amazing. The customer service was spectacular as well. The Gobi Manchurian is a must
The food was tasty and the service friendly!  Looking forward to going again!

Wonderful experience! The servers were so helpful  and friendly. The food amazing. So happy to have them near our home in Fort Myers. Thanks Bobby and Sudev for warming us up on this chilly evening with your warm hospitality and delicious food! Richard and Rebecca
Delicious food and great service.
Amazing food and variety! Took family for the lunch buffet today and kids loved it!

They did not let me miss the food back in India - and I say this just returning from a vacation in India last week. Delicious food, authentic flavors, just the right decor and lighting, perfectly explained dishes in the menu for the american friends in our party, exceptional service along with the super friendly hosts made our evening memorable. Undoubtedly the best Indian restaurant in the area. Thank you Masala Mantra - we’ll be back for more!

One of the finest Indian restaurants we have tried out in the region . Loved the food ,the ambience and the service . The menu is extensive, varied and caters from all tastes of Indian cuisine .  I would definitely recommend trying out their tandoor oven dishes as we loved them!! Will certainly be coming back for more

Whenever I try a new Indian restaurant I order 3 staple menu offerings : Tandoori chicken, chicken tikka masala and Alu Gobhi (potato and cauliflower). This gives me 2  evaluating points: judging the same food across restaurants and whether the restaurant got their cooking basics right.  Unfortunately ( and granted maybe it was a one-off day for the chef) the food was not just substandard ,it was also visually unappealing.  The tandoori chicken tasted more like barbecued chicken sprinkled with Indian spices and the Potato/ Cauliflower did not have the usual yellow/orange hue but was dark and dreary looking with the vegetables unidentifiable and covered with a green substance that almost made us wonder whether they had given us spinach by mistake !  I consider myself an Indian food lover and perhaps I’m setting the bar too high. Undoubtedly there will be people who love this restaurant’s offering and to them I apologize but I for one was disappointed by the food’s mediocrity.

Went there for dinner last night. After being seated we waited for 25 min and no one had come over to acknowledge us or take a drink order. Needless to say we got up from our table and left. They need to do a better job with their service.
Wonderful Indian cuisine, we shared many Indian dishes and appetizers. Staff was very attentive and friendly. A bit busy but worth the wait highly recommend

My family and I had a delicious dinner here. The host and waiter were very friendly and the food was perfect. We tried several dishes and each were great. I'm glad that we now have an Indian option in Cape Coral. I will definitely visit again.

Wow, what an amazing authentic Indian dinner we had this evening. We had several dishes to share and everything was superb. They were very busy but it was a short wait. The staff was wonderful and very attentive. Highly recommend !!!  Look forward to our next visit.
Great food, great service
One of the best Indian restaurants in the neighborhood, amazing service and great Ambience, must try place they treat you like family
Great food. The owner is very friendly. The restaurant is small and cozy.

This was an excellent experience.  Just like a vacation to India.  The food was outstanding, the atmosphere is pleasant and spotlessly clean and the service was friendly and welcoming. I highly recommend Masala Mantra to everyone ! Dr. Russ Crawford
Maybe I shouldn't say how good the food was so it doesn't get too busy. Nice people and ambiance too.

Absolutely amazing AUTHENTIC Indian food. The staff was very welcoming and friendly. The lunch buffet is very versified. Many different choices in entrees, sauces, and desserts. The chai tea is great. The restaurant is clean and the first thing you noticed when you walk in is the enticing aromas of the yummy food! We highly recommend this restaurant.
Very tasty!  Very authentic! Above average price for Cape Coral, but worth it

Pakora very tasty appetizer. Asked for korma for entree and they did not have it. Asked for mild vegetable biryani. It was good. Air conditioning was chilly. Parking is going to be an issue as they get busier especially lunch buffet.
We really enjoyed the kabobs and biriyani. The customer service is also great.
Awesome, authentic Indian food with welcoming service. You'll feel at home.
Very hard working people and very nice,the food was even better,there was a little bit of a wait but it's worth the wait i say
Excellent food, very friendly service. Very reasonably priced! A must see!
Great food, good service.  Really enjoyed it.  Delicious!
Food was amazing and service was excellent. I can’t wait to go back!
Very good food! I liked the chicken tikka masala especially. Like food from India!
Wonderful food, great location and fantastic friendly staff.  Good prices.  Lunch buffet is fabulous!  Highly recommended!!!!!!!!
