Absolutely amazing experience!  When we walked in I was recognized as someone who likes them on Facebook, which was a lot of fun!  Even without this I could tell they treat everyone like friends!  We were very impressed with the food and …
We been there and the food&service was top notch and great service. A must try in Cape.

The folks who brought this new restaurant to Cape Coral were formerly involved with the best Indian restaurant in Fort Myers.  They know what they are doing and they are genuinely great people we are glad to have here now, so my opinion is biased in a decidedly positive way.  We've eaten there three times already in the two weeks they've been open and I got some samosas to carry out another day.  For those who are new to Indian cuisine, you will find the atmosphere very welcoming and the menu explains the dishes well enough that you will be able to make good choices even if you are unfamiliar with the dishes.  Don't be afraid to try something new.  For those very familiar fans of Indian cuisine, you will find that this is just what you've been looking for.  This is the new jewel in our list of favorite places to dine in Cape Coral.
We enjoyed the delicious food and the warm, friendly service. A welcome addition to the non-existent Indian food scene in the Cape! A must try!
Delicious vegan entrees!  Amazing flavors. We'll be visiting again soon.

First Indian Cuisine Restaurant in Cape Coral. Best Indian Cuisine Restaurant in the area. These factors alone should make you give Masala Mantra a try but I have absolutely NO DOUBT you will return again and again, because these are the best hosts of any restaurant I have ever visited. The restaurant is nicely appointed, very comfortable and clean. The buffet offerings were delicious with some dishes not found at the other buffets. The food is not "spicy" unless indicated, but is really flavorful and there are sauces available to add any heat level you can stand.  My party consisted of 3 generations of my family and every member,  aged 82, 58,  and 19 received the same courteous attention that cannot be feigned. All 3 of us left feeling happy- well fed and treated like family. These are lovely hearted people who want to serve you delicious food and serve it well. And they DO.  I give Masala Mantra my highest recommendation . They are everything a restaurant should be- and more.

New Indian restaurant in Cape Coral- the food is amazing! We had a variety of food from appetizers to dessert and everything was delicious. The cauliflower appetizer is a must! A new favorite in the neighborhood.
Really good Indian food, we had the Gobi and Chicken Tikka Masala.  Taste and atmosphere were great.  Will definitely be coming back for more!

I went in for dinner last night and it was amazing. It was their grand opening and they were extremely busy but everyone was kind and courteous. The food was worth the wait. I ordered the Tikka Marsala and my husband ordered the Inferno along with garlic naan. Well done! We can't wait to come back.
Awesome food can’t wait to come back again!!!

Masala Mantra, the first Indian restaurant in Cape Coral. Living in Cape Coral, we have been waiting for this for a long time. We went there on Friday, October 25, 2019 for dinner. It was the first day of their ‘soft opening’. Excellent food, very friendly staff and nice ambience. We will definitely be going there on a regular basis.  We went there again on Friday, November 01, 2019. It was their first official opening day. We went for lunch buffet. Excellent selection of different dishes. Everything we tried was exceptionally delicious. In addition, great customer service and very nice ambience. We are very delighted to have Masala Mantra here in Cape Coral.

We had a fantastic lunch here during opening week and thoroughly enjoyed the food, the ambience and the service . I highly recommend the chicken lollipops especially if you have young kids :) can’t wait to visit again !
Absolutely awesome. Fantastic service and fantastic food. So happy to have this here in Cape.

Truly a phenomenal experience from start to finish! I have a very high standard when it comes to Indian food but Masala Mantra blew away my expectations. I had the Indian Inferno and it was spectacular. I highly highly recommend you stop in and try this place out!
